name: Skin Caviar Essence in Lotion, 150ml
description:
Editors’ Notes

La Prairie's 'Skin Caviar Essence-in-Lotion' is engineered to prepare your skin to harness the benefits of your skincare routine, so be sure to follow with the brand's 'Skin Caviar Liquid Lift' and 'Skin Caviar Luxe Cream' to maximize its potential. It's infused with Caviar Water derived using a distillation process to extract the most delicate elements which work to hydrate, soften and firm the skin for a rejuvenated complexion.

Details & Care

Instructions for use:

Apply to cleansed skin every morning or evening
Tap lightly into area until absorbed
150ml/ 5.1fl.oz.
This item has been imported

Delivery & Returns

Find out more about our delivery options. Skincare, cosmetics and haircare must be returned unused, unopened, and in their original packaging. Please note that fragrance, nail polish, candles and aerosols are final sale and cannot be returned due to transport restrictions.
